articles.title: Powerful magnitude 6.3 earthquake strikes Greek holiday island of Crete - Daily Mail
articles.description: A magnitude 6.3 earthquake struck the Greek island of Crete on Tuesday, the European Mediterranean Seismological Centre said. The quake was at a depth of 2 km, EMSC said.
articles.content:
A powerful magnitude 6.3 earthquake struck off the Crete on Tuesday, two weeks after another tremor killed a man on the Greek island and damaged hundreds of buildings. 
The epicenter was about 31 mi… [+3425 chars]

articles.title: Risk of dangerous blood clots linked to moderate Covid-19: European study - The Straits Times
articles.description: High-dose blood thinner can prevent clots in moderately ill Covid-19 patients.  . Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
